ai-ps3.6:1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these three kinds of demonstration.
ai-ps3.6:1.3_0: The demonstration of psychic power, the demonstration of revealing, and the demonstration of instruction.
ai-ps3.6:2.1_0: And what is the demonstration of psychic power?
ai-ps3.6:2.2_0: It’s when someone wields the many kinds of psychic power:
ai-ps3.6:2.5_0: he exercises power as far as the Brahmā realm.
ai-ps3.6:2.6_0: This is called the demonstration of psychic power.
ai-ps3.6:3.1_0: And what is the demonstration of revealing?
ai-ps3.6:3.2_0: It’s when someone reveals by means of a sign:
ai-ps3.6:3.3_0: ‘This is what you’re thinking, such is your thought, and thus is your state of mind.’
ai-ps3.6:3.4_0: And even if they reveal this many times, it turns out exactly so, not otherwise.
ai-ps3.6:3.5_0: In another case, someone reveals by hearing it from humans or non-humans or deities,
ai-ps3.6:3.6_0: ‘This is what you’re thinking, such is your thought, and thus is your state of mind.’
ai-ps3.6:3.7_0: And even if they reveal this many times, it turns out exactly so, not otherwise.
ai-ps3.6:3.8_0: In another case, someone reveals by hearing the sound of thought spreading as someone thinks and considers:
ai-ps3.6:3.9_0: ‘This is what you’re thinking, such is your thought, and thus is your state of mind.’
ai-ps3.6:3.10_0: And even if they reveal this many times, it turns out exactly so, not otherwise.
ai-ps3.6:3.11_0: In another case, someone comprehends the mind of a person who has attained the immersion that’s free of placing the mind and keeping it connected. They understand:
ai-ps3.6:3.12_0: ‘Judging by the way this person’s intentions are directed, immediately after this mind state, they’ll think this thought.’
ai-ps3.6:3.13_0: And even if they reveal this many times, it turns out exactly so, not otherwise.
ai-ps3.6:3.14_0: This is called the demonstration of revealing.
ai-ps3.6:4.1_0: And what is a demonstration of instruction?
ai-ps3.6:4.2_0: It’s when someone instructs others like this:
ai-ps3.6:4.4_0: pay attention like this, not like this;
ai-ps3.6:4.6_0: This is called a demonstration of instruction.
ai-ps3.6:4.7_0: These are the three kinds of demonstration.”
ai-ps3.6:5.3_0: And those who have purified renunciation, good will, and harmlessness:
ai-ps3.6:5.4_0: The demonstration of revealing is finished.
ai-ps3.6:5.5_0: “But this kind of renunciation should be developed like this.”
ai-ps3.6:6.3_0: And those who have ill will, without malicious intentions:
ai-ps3.6:6.4_0: The demonstration of revealing is finished.
ai-ps3.6:6.5_0: “And this kind of good will be developed and cultivated in this way you should develop mindfulness meditation.”
ai-ps3.6:7.3_0: Your minds of those perceptions of the world with malicious intentions:
ai-ps3.6:7.4_0: The demonstration of revealing is finished.
ai-ps3.6:7.5_0: “But this perception should be developed and cultivated in this way: ‘The perception of light is to be developed by me, frequently practiced, and mental mindfulness.’”
ai-ps3.6:8.3_0: And those who have no malicious intentions:
ai-ps3.6:8.4_0: The demonstration of revealing is finished.
ai-ps3.6:8.5_0: “But an adept should be cultivated in this way: ‘When mindfulness should be developed and cultivated like this, mindfulness should be cultivated, and situational awareness.”
ai-ps3.6:9.1_0: Tells of the teaching; they practice accordingly.
ai-ps3.6:9.2_0: doubts about the bathing and developed.
ai-ps3.6:9.3_0: And those who have possessed the imperturbable teaching, they all have purified intentions:
ai-ps3.6:9.4_0: The demonstration of revealing is finished.
ai-ps3.6:9.5_0: “This is how you should cultivate the way of taking up the teaching. When you’re practicing in this way, you should cultivate mindfulness meditation.”
ai-ps3.6:10.3_0: And those who have a purified and superhuman, those who have purified intentions:
ai-ps3.6:10.4_0: The demonstration of revealing is finished.
ai-ps3.6:10.5_0: “This knowledge of this is how you should cultivate, develop, and make much of it.”
ai-ps3.6:11.2_0: liking discontent, gives up discontent with the spiritual life.
ai-ps3.6:11.3_0: And those who have a joyful minds, all those who have purified intentions,
ai-ps3.6:11.4_0: The demonstration of revealing is finished.
ai-ps3.6:11.5_0: “But this kind of joy should be cultivated in this way: ‘This is the joy of me. When this is the teaching should be developed, mindfulness should be cultivated, and situational awareness.”
ai-ps3.6:11.6_0: The demonstration of instruction is finished.
ai-ps3.6:12.3_0: And those who have possessed the first absorption, all those who have subtle intentions,
ai-ps3.6:12.4_0: The demonstration of revealing is finished.
ai-ps3.6:12.5_0: “But this kind of meditation should be developed and cultivated in this way: ‘When mindfulness should be developed and cultivated like this, mindfulness should be cultivated, and fathomed:
ai-ps3.6:12.6_0: The demonstration of instruction is finished.
ai-ps3.6:13.1_0: perfection is the path to Worthiness and drowsiness.
ai-ps3.6:13.2_0: He enjoys all defilements and deportments:
ai-ps3.6:13.3_0: And all those who have entered the path to Worthiness with that which is purified and surpasses that of,
ai-ps3.6:13.4_0: The demonstration of revealing is finished.
ai-ps3.6:13.5_0: “And this path should be developed in this way: ‘When you should cultivate mindfulness, frequently reflection, mindfulness should be developed like this.’”
ai-ps3.6:14.3_0: The demonstration of psychic power, this is called the demonstration of psychic power.
ai-ps3.6:14.6_0: The demonstration of psychic power, this is called the demonstration of psychic power.
ai-ps3.6:14.9_0: perfection is the path to Worthiness and drowsiness.
ai-ps3.6:14.10_0: He enjoys all defilements and deportments:
ai-ps3.6:14.11_0: The demonstration of psychic power, the demonstration of psychic power, this is called the demonstration of psychic power.
ai-ps3.6:14.12_0: The account of the noble ones is finished.
